headline: Is Cigna Group an Opportunity After Its 14% Share Price Slide?
summary: Wondering if Cigna Group stock is actually a bargain right now? You are not alone, as many investors are reevaluating its place in their portfolios. While the stock has rallied 5.1% in the past week, it is still down 14.2% over the last year and 1.2% year to date, suggesting shifting market sentiment and maybe some opportunities. Recently, headlines have focused on sector-wide shifts in healthcare policy and changing insurance demand, both of which have sharply influenced investor attitudes...
